from digitalmodel.modules.orcaflex.orcaflex_utilities import OrcaflexUtilities
ou = OrcaflexUtilities()
print(''Testing OrcaFlex license availability...'')
result = ou.is_orcaflex_available()
print(f''License available: {result}'')

    print(''This confirms that OrcaFlex license detection is working correctly.'')
    print(''The license is being detected as unavailable, which may be expected if OrcFxAPI is not properly installed.'')
